messages.message: Thank you for connecting! You must be a genius :D

Hi! Thank you for kind words :) but genius is nothing,  Its always about execution ;) 
http://www.forbes.com/sites/bryanstolle/2014/07/22/vision-without-execution-is-just-hallucination/#576b4d193bee
I agree completely! So what is the most important thing you want to accomplish?
Time will show and users will decide ;)  what is important from them. :) I saw that you speak Polish. How did you found me?
My wife is Polish. Not sure where I found you. I just friend people that I think look smart.

Cool :) My linkedin profile is a little bit outdated and what I would like to also add is that I spent some time in SV during acceleration program with my team in San Francisco, started company there and willing to continue business when I will be ready.
Excellent! I recently had interviews in San Francisco. Lots of cash floating around there. Also lots of homeless drug abusers.

Yes, not only homeless but also crazy. Capitalism is like yin i yang and I would like to belive that its on the white side with a small black dot ;) Anyway Im coming back there and my best friend who is Chile ambasador get position in Houston so I guess I will be visiting US several times next year so lets meet if there will be possibility.
Sure. We live in Phoenix but we will also be visit Prague and Poland this year. We will keep you updated :)
